info.name: Dark www.Gumtree.com.au
info.description:
A sleek dark Gumtree style for www.gumtree.com.au.

- Dark, but not too dark!
- Easy to read font on a dark background.
- Great in both dark and lit environments.
info.additionalInfo:
Update V2.5 - 15/06/2018
  • Fixes bump ad checkout colours
    • Fixes colours for posting an add - some work still needed here

    • More fixes for managed ads colour issues

    • Fixed colour for messages
    • Fixed colour for login page
